Utilities

Class Reply

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utilities.Reply

  • public class Reply
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an object, reply It has the text that it contains, an amount of points, if it is endorsed or not, a timestamp, a creation username, a userid, an id, a reply parent (for if it is a reply of a reply) and a question that it was a reply to
    Author:
    sae1

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reply

        public Reply()
        Create a reply object from the android app

      • Reply

        public Reply(java.lang.String reply,
             java.lang.String rating,
             boolean endorsed,
             java.lang.String time_stamp,
             java.lang.String username,
             java.lang.String userID,
             Question q,
             java.lang.String replyParent,
             java.util.ArrayList<Reply> replies)
        Constructor for a reply
        Parameters:
        reply - the text of the reply
        rating - the number of upvotes the reply has gotten
        endorsed - if the reply is endorsed or not
        time_stamp - the time the reply was created
        username - the username of the person who wrote the reply
        userID - the user id of the person who wrote the reply
        q - the parent question that this reply corresponds to
        replyParent - the reply parent that this reply corresponds to (if it is a reply of a reply)
        replies - a list of replies that this reply has to it
